ads always stuck in pending

I'm sorry to hear that your ads are stuck in pending. Could you please let me know if your account is new and whether it has been verified? This information will help me provide more specific guidance.
probably new

Thanks for letting me know. Since your account is new, it might not be verified yet. To proceed with the verification process and have your ads approved, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
okay i sent the email please have that reviewed asap

Great! Thank you for sending the email. Our team will review the information as soon as possible and update you on your account status. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
